title: Kristen Bell dazzles in blue as she talks about her new Disney+ series Encore!
text:
Kristen Bell is a busy woman.

She's currently promoting the highly anticipated Frozen 2 as well as her new Disney+ series, Encore! which she executive produced.

On Friday, the 39-year-old spoke onstage at The International Documentary Association about her new nonfiction series.

Busy woman: Kristen Bell currently promoting the highly anticipated Frozen 2 as well as her new Disney+ series, Encore! in which she executive produced

For the occasion, the actress wore a modest, all blue ensemble.

She wore a sky blue dress with a peter pan collar and buttons down the middle that cropped just above her ankles to show her matching pants.

When she sat the dress had a slit that showed off the pants a bit more as she chatted about her upcoming project.

Looking good: For the occasion, the actress wore a modest, all blue ensemble

Encore! The new Disney+ original series will follow former high school peers who come together to recreate the musicals that they performed while they were in high school such as The Sound of Music, Annie, Beauty and the Beast, Annie, and more

The new Disney+ original series will follow former high school peers who come together to recreate the musicals that they performed while they were in high school such as The Sound of Music, Annie, Beauty and the Beast, Annie, and more.

It originally aired back in December 2017 when the former high schoolers recreated their 1997 play of Into the Woods.

Encore! is set to hit the streaming platform on November 12.

Stylish: She wore a sky blue dress with a peter pan collar and buttons down the middle that cropped just above her ankles to show her matching pants

Pals: Kristen and the Disney+ Content & Marketing President Ricky Strauss smile on the black carpet before the panel

And while she is juggling her new series, she is also doing loads of press for her new movie, Frozen 2.

She revealed last week that all of her hard work and determination for the sequel has almost been foiled by her two daughters Lincoln, aged six, and Delta, aged four.

'I have told them the entire plot line,' she said to E! News. 'They know everything; they know all the new characters; they know all the new songs.'

Chatting away: Kristen chats about her new project on stage with Lynette Rice
description: She's currently promoting the highly anticipated Frozen 2 as well as her new Disney+ series, Encore! in which she executive produced. On Friday, the 39-year-old spoke onstage.
